title: Where to Take Free Online Classes While You’re Stuck at Home
description: If you’ve always wanted to go back to school, why not put your ongoing involuntary stay-at-home downtime to good use with a free online class? There are literally thousands  of virtual university courses (known as Massive Open Online Courses, or MOOCs) and on…
